com.citytechinc.canary.services.manager
[Groovy] Class DefaultServiceManager

java.lang.Object
  com.citytechinc.canary.services.manager.DefaultServiceManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServiceManager
@org.apache.felix.scr.annotations.Component(immediate = true)
@org.apache.felix.scr.annotations.Service
@Properties(value = [
    @Property(name = OsgiConstants.SERVICE_VENDOR, value = Constants.CITYTECH_SERVICE_VENDOR_NAME) ])
@Slf4j
class DefaultServiceManager
extends Object

Authors:
Josh Durbin, CITYTECH, Inc. 2013 Copyright 2013 CITYTECH, Inc. The service manager acts as a conduit between the Felix OSGi container, its services (monitored services, notification agents, poll response handlers, and persistence services), and the actor framework. Most of this service is boiler plate code which it'd be nice to work around, but that's for a later date...
